document.full_text: apple and google smartphones may come under tighter regulation in europe after a data protection panel ruled that data on the location of their users should be classed as private, the financial times said thursday.
document.title: apple and android phones face strict laws in europe: report
lines_and_colors: apple and google smartphones may come under tighter regulation in europe after a data protection panel ruled that data on the location of their users should be classed as private, the financial times said thursday.
